document.full_text: more than 15,000 people have fled sudan's abyei region to the south after the northern army seized the disputed area and parts of the main town were burned and looted, united nations officials said tuesday.
document.title: thousands flee violence in sudan's abyei, u.n. says
lines_and_colors: more than 15,000 people have fled sudan's abyei region to the south after the northern army seized the disputed area and parts of the main town were burned and looted, united nations officials said tuesday.
